com.foreach.across.modules.webcms.web.thymeleaf

Class WebCmsComponentContentModelWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.foreach.across.modules.webcms.web.thymeleaf.WebCmsComponentContentModelWriter

  • @Exposed
 @Component
public final class WebCmsComponentContentModelWriter
extends Object
    Writes text or HTML output to the Thymeleaf model while optionally replacing all content markers.
    Since:
    0.0.2
    Author:
    Arne Vandamme
    See Also:
    WebCmsContentMarker, WebCmsContentMarkerService
